original_title: CNN's Segment on Slavery Got Blown Up by a Lefty MAGA Supporter  — The Donald
article_summary: CNN's segment on slavery was criticized by a MAGA supporter, with discussions on media bias and the persistence of slavery-like conditions in modern society. The conversation became heated, with some participants accusing the media of perpetuating the issue and others questioning the relevance of discussing slavery in the current context.</s>
